content: this is a no-sew pattern with his long arms he s often seen giving people hugs mainly himself and also hanging around different places this pattern requires * basic knowledge of tapestry crochet reading charts and changing colours * optional velcro or snap buttons to secure onto the hands * 8mm safety eyes * 4 different yarn colours 1 body 1 mouth 2 for the jacket includes a printer friendly text only version of the pattern
